title: 7.22 LAG, no FPS or Ping drop in game champion just freezes

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello!

Since 7.22 came out, I get a pretty consistent lag on several of our home computers when playing League and only league. 

My champ just freezes, ping stays the same, FPS stays the same.

I do not have a Warez running in the background and I don't know how to fix this problem. 

Attached is a ping test and benchmark for my computer.

Any suggestions appreciated!

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) just in case to see if this might be caused by packet loss at all.  Let me know what you find!  Otherwise, see if the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide might help here, as well as trying a framecap via in-game video options.

If that doesn't help, attach those logs from the HRT into a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a look with you.
Same issues here on EUW. Cant find a way to solve this... {{champion:32}}

https://imgur.com/BnyTk2G

Also, I ran the hex-tech  thing, but I do not know how to interpret all the files or results. :-(
